title: L'Empereur
overview: In 2005, after a drunken office party, Christian takes Manuela home and the end of the evening gets out of hand. However, they continue to work together. Christian helps Manuela climb the ladder and makes her his partner. In 2015, a woman denounces Christian to the police: she claims to be a rape victim. Christian is a father, a loving husband, the company idolizes him and his entourage benefits from his largesse. Will Manuela decide to dive back into her trauma to speak out?
